system
Interface Ambulance

All Known Implementing Classes:
AmbulanceImpl
public interface Ambulance

The Ambulance interface represents the set of all ambulances known by the system. An ambulance is either normal, either medicalized depending on its equipement and the skills of its staff. The status of an ambulance is its ability to perform some actions, so an ambulance is either working, either broken. The availability of an ambulance is its ability to perform some actions for a while. So the availability of an ambulance is either free, either chosen, either mobilized.

Author:
Simon Busard , Antoine Cailliau

Method Detail

addAmbulance

void addAmbulance(java.lang.String ambulanceId,
                  Coord position,
                  java.lang.String kind,
                  java.lang.String status)
                  throws AmbulanceStatusUnknwownException,
                         AmbulanceKindUnknownException
Add an ambulance in the system.

Parameters:
ambulanceId - The unique identifier of the ambulance
position - The position of the ambulance
kind - The kind of an ambulance
status - The status of an ambulance
Throws:
AmbulanceStatusUnknwownException - The status of the ambulance is not known.
AmbulanceKindUnknownException - The kind of the ambulance is not known
Precondition:
ambulanceId the id of the new ambulance coord the new ambulance coordinates kind the kind of the new ambulance (normal or medicalized) status the ambulance status (working, broken)
Postcondition
a new ambulance is stored in the system

getAllFree

java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getAllFree(java.lang.String kind,
                                                  java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> exclusionSet)
Return all free ambulance of kind that are not listed in exclusionSet

Parameters:
kind - The needed kind of the ambulance
exclusionSet - The set of ambulance that cannot be chosen for this incident.
Precondition:
kind the ambulance kind needed (normal or medicalized) exclusionSet a list of ambulance ids that dont have to be taken in account
Postcondition
return a list of ids of free ambulances

setIncidentChosenFor

void setIncidentChosenFor(java.lang.String ambulanceId,
                          java.lang.String incidentInfoId)
Set incident for which ambulance is chosen to incidentInfoId. If the ambulance is no longer chosen, then incidentInfoId should be null.

Parameters:
ambulanceId - The unique identifier of the ambulance
incidentInfoId - The unique indentifier of the incident
Precondition:
ambulanceId id of the ambulance incidentInfoId id of the incident
Postcondition
choice for the ambulance is updated, ambulance is chosen for the incident incidentInfoId if incidentInfoId is not null and the ambulance is free if incidentInfoId is null.

setIncidentMobilizedFor

void setIncidentMobilizedFor(java.lang.String ambulanceId,
                             java.lang.String incidentInfoId)
                             throws IllegalMobilizationException
Set incident for which ambulance is mobilized to incidentInfoId. If the ambulance is no longer mobilized, then incidentInfoId should be null.

Parameters:
ambulanceId - The unique identifier of the ambulance
incidentInfoId - The unique indentifier of the incident
Throws:
IllegalMobilizationException - The mobilization is illegal since the ambulance was not chosen before.
Precondition:
ambulanceId id of the ambulance incidentInfoId id of the incident
Postcondition
mobilization for the ambulance is updated, ambulance is mobilized for the incident incidentInfoId if incidentInfoId is not null and the ambulance is free if incidentInfoId is null.
